summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Holy Navigator Bible app. Backend APIs are fully functional with proper authentication and premium protection. Frontend loads correctly with all core features working including Bible reading, devotionals, dictionary, and navigation. Fixed one critical backend security issue with forum endpoint protection.

fixed_issues.issue: Missing premium protection - was accessible without subscription
fixed_issues.fix_applied: Added get_premium_user() protection to GET /forum/posts endpoint

design_issues.issue: Missing data-testid attributes for automated testing

passed_tests: Premium protection for journal, forum, news analysis
Landing page loads with hero, features, pricing sections
Bible page displays books list, chapter selection, verse content
Devotional page shows today's devotional with scripture and reflection
Dictionary page displays word definitions with Hebrew/Greek translations
User interface color scheme (blue #0A2463 and gold #C5A059)

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all core features working, minor testability issue)
